text: A Hello world program is usually a program made by computer programmers that are new to a programming languages, or to test if the compiler for this language is working correctly. It will simply put the text Hello, World! on the screen. == Wikipedia articles that have Hello world programs == == Sources == == Other websites == * helloworld.org * The Hello World Collection * codepad.org - Can compile some of the programs Category:Programming languages Category:Software
title: Hello world program
